#cell attributes like area, mcherry intensity, etc at t=0
```{r}
#cells with pup1-rfp

modc_cells.pup1.2 <- read_csv("../generate_dfs/pup1-rfp-gfp-decay/6-28-22-modc-gfp/data/6-28-22_mODC_pup1_attributes.csv") %>% 
  filter(experiment == "20min")


cln2_cells.pup1.3 <- read_csv("../generate_dfs/pup1-rfp-gfp-decay/7-20-22-cln2-gfp/data/7-20-22_cln2_pup1_attributes.csv")


all.pup1.data <-bind_rows(
            modc_cells.pup1.2 %>%
              mutate(degron = "mODC.2"),
           cln2_cells.pup1.3 %>%
            mutate(degron = "cln2.3")) %>%
  select(unique.trackID, 
         gfp.mean.bg.af.sub.new, 
         gfp.sum.bg.af.sub,
         area, 
         area.puncta,
         # BB_B,
         # BB_C,
         Elip_B,
         Elip_C,
         no.of.voxels,
         pos.x,
         pos.y,
         spheracity,
         volume,
         rfp.mean.bg.sub,
         rfp.sum.bg.sub,
         dapi.mean.bg.sub,
         dapi.sum.bg.sub,
         rfp.mean.bg.sub.puncta,
         # rfp.mean.af.sub.puncta,
         rfp.sum.bg.sub.puncta,
         # rfp.sum.af.sub.puncta,
         dapi.sum.bg.sub.puncta,
         # dapi.sum.af.sub.puncta,
         dapi.mean.bg.sub.puncta,
         # dapi.mean.af.sub.puncta,
         degron,area.puncta) %>% 
  rename("cell.id"="unique.trackID" ) %>% 
  mutate(red = "pup1-rfp",
         treatment = "none",
         cell.id = paste0(cell.id ,"_",degron,"_",red,"_",treatment))
all.pup1.data %>% 
  write_csv(.,path = "all_pup1_cell_attr.csv")


```




##MG135 proteasome inhibition experiments
DMSO
```{r}
dmso_cell_attributes2 <- read.csv("../generate_dfs/proteasome_inhibition/data/4-1-22/DMSO/4-1-22-GFP_mODC_DMSO_attributes.csv")
```

1uM
```{r}
cell.info.1uM <- read.csv("../generate_dfs/proteasome_inhibition/data/4-1-22/1uM/4-1-22-GFP_mODC_1uMMG132_attributes.csv")
```

2.5uM
```{r}
cell.info.2.5uM <- read.csv("../generate_dfs/proteasome_inhibition/data/4-1-22/2.5uM/4-1-22-GFP_mODC_2.5uMMG132_attributes.csv")
```

5uM
```{r}

cell.info.5uM <- read.csv("../generate_dfs/proteasome_inhibition/data/4-1-22/5uM/4-1-22-GFP_mODC_5uMMG132_attributes.csv")
```

Combined dataframes 
```{r}
all.Prot.Inhi.info <- bind_rows(
            dmso_cell_attributes2 %>% 
            mutate(treatment = "dmso2"),
            cell.info.1uM %>% 
              mutate(treatment = "1uM"),
            cell.info.2.5uM %>% 
               mutate(treatment = "2.5uM"),
            cell.info.5uM %>% 
               mutate(treatment = "5uM")) %>% 
  mutate(rfp.mean.bg.sub.puncta = ifelse(is.na(rfp.mean.bg.sub.puncta), 0, rfp.mean.bg.sub.puncta), 
         degron = "mODC",
         red = "pup1-rfp")
```

```{r}
all.Prot.Inhi.info %>% 
  write_csv(.,"all_data/all_mg135_attr.csv")
```
